user_instruction: 'Send an email to Dr. Smith (harold.smith@consultant.com) with my ideas on passenger flow improvements. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["harold.smith@consultant.com"],"subject":"Passenger Flow Improvement Ideas","body":"Dear Dr. Smith,

I hope you are well. I wanted to share a concise overview of ideas I’ve been developing to enhance passenger flow throughout the terminal:

• Reconfigure the security-checkpoint layout to add additional screening lanes and incorporate a dynamic queue-management system that adjusts in real time via digital signage and analytics.

• Pilot biometric pre-screening (e.g., facial or fingerprint verification) to accelerate identity checks while maintaining current security standards.

• Leverage newly installed support pillars in the main concourse as natural lane dividers, guiding travelers toward gates and reducing bottlenecks.

• Introduce smart, adaptive materials in high-traffic flooring and structural elements to handle varying foot-traffic loads more comfortably and safely.

I would value your feedback on which of these concepts aligns best with your current objectives and where a deeper dive might be most beneficial.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to your thoughts.

Best regards,

[Your Name]"}
